Name: family
Description: sub-grouping of languoids above the language level

Name: dialect
Description: any variety which is not a language

Name: shifting
Description: EGIDS: 7; UNESCO: definitely endangered; ElCat: definitely endangered

Name: moribund
Description: EGIDS: 8a; UNESCO: severely endangered; ElCat: severely endangered

Name: nearly extinct
Description: EGIDS: 8b; UNESCO: critically endangered; ElCat: critically endangered

Name: phonology/text
Description: New Testament, Text, Phonology, (typological) Study Of A Specific Feature or Dictionary
